featured.text: After the band played an introduction, Wesla Whitfield wheeled herself onstage in a wheelchair.
As she sang, Whitfield’s voice was so powerful and soulful that everyone in the room forgot the wheelchair was even there.
Whitfield said she came to understand that the only thing she had lost in this misfortunate event was the ability to walk.
Raised in California, Whitfield began performing in public at age 18, when she took a job as a singing waitress at a pizza parlor.

other.text: In which of the following places has Wesla Whitfield worked? (A) A college.
Which of the following statements is true about Wesla Whitfield’s physical disability?
At 57, Whitfield is small and pretty, witty and humble, persistent and philosophical.

definition.zh_def: 一種特定的植物或動物的名稱，通常用於科學分類。
definition.en_def: A specific name for a type of plant or animal, often used in scientific classification.
definition.example: The Whitfield species is known for its unique characteristics.
